description: Detects a suspicious process spawning from an Outlook process.
author: Michael Haag
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Markus Neis
Elastic
FPT.EagleEye Team
name: Suspicious Outlook Child Process
query: (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\OUTLOOK.EXE" AND process.executable.text:("*\\AppVLP.exe" OR "*\\bash.exe" OR "*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\forfiles.exe" OR "*\\hh.exe" OR "*\\mftrace.exe" OR "*\\msbuild.exe" OR "*\\msdt.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\msiexec.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\schtasks.exe" OR "*\\scrcons.exe" OR "*\\scriptrunner.exe" OR "*\\sh.exe" OR "*\\svchost.exe" OR "*\\wmic.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe"))
